regen.new_specification: The System shall notify the administrator when an unauthorized access attempt or a validly attempted violation is captured.

regen.absent_element: notification or alert for access control violations
regen.new_specification: The System shall notify or alert the administrator when an unauthorized access attempt is detected.

regen.absent_element: specification for handling authorized access attempts
regen.new_specification: The System must capture and store details of all access attempts, including successful authorized accesses, to ensure a comprehensive audit trail.

label: The System must be able to capture and store violations of cases where violations can validly be attempted.
